Source.Name: usermode
Source.Summary: Provide superuser privileges to ordinary users
Source.Description: usermode contains the userhelper program, which can be used to allow configured programs to be run with superuser privileges by ordinary users, and several graphical tools for users

Package.Name: usermode
Package.Summary: Provide superuser privileges to ordinary users
Package.Description: usermode contains the userhelper program, which can be used to allow configured programs to be run with superuser privileges by ordinary users, and several graphical tools for users
